class.name: VoxelGenerator
class.brief_description: Base class to all voxel procedural generators. If you want to define a custom one with a script, this is the class you should extend from. All implementations must be thread safe.

method.name: generate_block
method.description: Generates a block of voxels within the specified world area. [code]out_buffer[/code]: Buffer in which voxel data will be generated. It should not be [code]null[/code] and should be given the requested size. Do not keep a reference on it after the call. [code]origin_in_voxels[/code]: Coordinates of the lower corner of the box to generate, relative to LOD0. [code]lod[/code]: Level of detail index to use for this block. Some generators might not support LOD, in which case it can be left 0.
